exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet m : mid H : CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) d Unable to unify "valid (post_msg (dsoup ?M1562) ?M1563).1 /\\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m (post_msg (dsoup ?M1562) ?M1563).1 = Some ms -> active ms -> exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg ms e)" with "let 'SimplFun lam := [Pred s | valid s /\\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> active ms -> exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg ms e)] in lam match find m (let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup) with | Some m0 => upd m (mark_msg m0) (let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup) | None => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup end".

ctx: unfold LockCoh, soup_coh, consume_msg, dsoup in *.
unfold LockCoh, soup_coh, consume_msg, dsoup in *.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
d: dstatelet
m: Ordered.sort mid

Goal:
LockCoh d -> soup_coh (consume_msg (dsoup d) m)

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
nid = nat : Set
soup_coh = Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> active ms -> exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg ms e)] : Pred soup
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
LockCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
Notation seq := list
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
soup_coh_post_msg : forall (d : dstatelet) (m : msg TaggedMessage), soup_coh (dsoup d) -> (exists e : nat_eqType, coh_msg m e) -> soup_coh (post_msg (dsoup d) m).1
lock_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soup_coh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & state_coh d] : dstatelet -> Prop
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIVs : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> valid (dsoup d)
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
l2 : forall d : dstatelet, lock_coh d -> valid (dsoup d)
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Record tuple_of (n : nat) (T : Type) : Type := Tuple { tval : seq T; _ : is_true (size tval == n) } Arguments tuple.tuple_of _%nat_scope _%type_scope Arguments tuple.Tuple [n]%nat_scope [T]%type_scope [tval]%seq_scope
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
l1 : forall d : dstatelet, lock_coh d -> valid (dstate d)
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
l3 : forall d : dstatelet, lock_coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI = fun (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) => [Pred d | coh p d /\ I d (Protocols.Exports.nodes p d)] : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Simpl_Pred dstatelet Arguments InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI _ _%function_scope
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
Actions.send_act_safe : world -> forall p : protocol, nid -> Label -> send_trans (coh p) -> seq nat -> nid -> state -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
state_coh = fun d : dstatelet => forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> local_coh n (getLocal n d) : dstatelet -> Prop
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohSt : forall (p : protocol) (d : dstatelet), coh p d -> Coh (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.W p) (plab p \\-> d)
InductiveInv.PWIExports.cohSt : forall (p : protocol) (d : dstatelet), coh p d -> Coh (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.W p) (plab p \\-> d)
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)

``` 
intros.
unfold LockCoh, soup_coh, consume_msg, dsoup in *.
intros Hlockcoh.
apply soup_coh_post_msg.
- unfold LockCoh in Hlockcoh. apply Hlockcoh.
- unfold coh_msg. intros m0 Hm0.
  exists e. apply Hm0.
```

original: intros. unfold LockCoh, soup_coh, consume_msg, dsoup in *. intros Hlockcoh. apply soup_coh_post_msg. - unfold LockCoh in Hlockcoh. apply Hlockcoh. - unfold coh_msg. intros m0 Hm0. exists e. apply Hm0.
